name: Watermelon White Negroni Slushie
description: Skip sugary frozen fruit drinks this summer, and try this chilly spin on the classic Negroni cocktail.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups gin, such as Broker's or St. George Botanivore
Watermelon and orange slices, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: For the watermelon gin: In an airtight container, combine gin and watermelon. Keep in a cool, dark place for 48 hours. Strain into a clean, airtight container until ready to use. Will keep up to one year.
For the Watermelon White Negroni Slushie: Combine watermelon gin, Cocchi Americano, and vermouth in an airtight container and freeze for at least 8 hours.

When ready to serve, add frozen alcohol to a blender with ice. Blend on high speed until smooth, about 30 seconds. Split between rocks glasses or white wine glasses. Garnish each glass with a watermelon and orange slice.
